name: Don't Break Anything!
description:
IN "DON'T BREAK ANYTHING" YOU PLAY AS A YOUNG STUDENT WHOSE UNFITNESS AT FOLLOWING THE RULES TAKES A BRAND NEW MEANING. WREAK HAVOC IN YOUR CLASSROOM AND PROVE YOURSELF AS THE ULTIMATE BREAKER!

"DON'T BREAK ANYTHING" IS THE VERY FIRST PROJECT OF 
SIMONE CICCHETTI AND PAOLO GUARINO,
 TWO ITALIAN GAME DESIGN STUDENTS WHO DECIDED TO SIMULATE A WEEKLY GAME JAM: THE RANDOMIZED THEME RESULTED TO BE "BREAK THE RULES"

Note: this whole text is in CAPS because I was lazy

Why are you still reading? Start to break something!
